column4: hi all... how can I load vesa-fb @ startup?? I miss a high-res command line ;-)
set a different videomode with "vga=XXX" as a kernel-parameter iirc
tried that, but the kernel-module is not loaded or even there... it used to work for 7.04, but sadly upgrading to 7.10 I had a dead command-line...
don't ask to ask, just ask
